TrackEvent.summary: The TrackEvent interface, which is part of the HTML DOM specification, is used for events which represent changes to a set of available tracks on an HTML media element; these events are addtrack and removetrack.

remarks.para: It's important not to confuse TrackEvent with the interface, which is used for tracks which are part of an .
Events based on TrackEvent are always sent to one of the media track list types:
